about_the_game:
Have a full control over the design of each engines, fuel tanks, rockets and your launch site to explore beyond Earth. In Rocket Engineer you’ll design your own launch site to then make your own parts, which once tested, will be integrated in your rockets to fly them out of Earth's atmosphere.

Features


Realistic rocket design process
From design to testing and testing to launching your rockets to explore the solar system, Rocket Engineer offers a deep gameplay mechanics. Each rocket components will need to be tested through several types of tests in order for this part to become more reliable

Dynamic Launch site
Would you be to crash your rocket, put too much pressure on one of your equipment, your launch site could be broken. Players are able to fully manage their launch site by building it and making their own propellant lines between each building of their launch site

Realistic physics system
Rocket Engineer offers a realistic physics systems, allowing them to successfully maneuver their rockets.. or use it to crash spectacularly!

Parts variety
Rocket Engineer will offer a great variety of parts, allowing players to specifically choose what they want to design. The game also go deeply, to the point of the engines being separated in multiples subparts

Fuel system
Rocket Engineer will offer a great variety of oxidizer and propellant that can be all combined at your risks. Each has different states that are being simulated depending on their pressure and temperature.

Communtiy
The community will be at the core of Rocket Engineer’s development. Suggestions and feedback will all be taken in account for the whole lifetime of Rocket Engineer.

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (or higher)

short_description: Rocket Engineer is a simulation game about designing, testing and launching your rockets to explore. Rocket Engineer focuses on the engineering aspect of rockets, while allowing a fun exploration experience.
